Name: Hoytman
AboutMe: I am a web developer based out of Chattanooga Tn. I am the webmaster for several companies in the area. I am currently using Codeigniter and my platform/framework of choice, but I have also used Drupal in the past. I am constantly impressed by the variety of object oriented PHP that is used out there and would like to learn and contribute more to the community. I am still learning more than I am teaching, but I have been able to accomplish a lot with the aid and expertise of the Stack Overflow community. I am currently getting back into Drupal with a furry, so expect a lot of Drupal questions.
